name: react-hono-sse
description: React client with Hono server and Server-Sent Events

scripts.build: pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client
scripts.docker:down: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.format: pnpm run format:client && pnpm run format:server
scripts.format:check: pnpm run format:check:client && pnpm run format:check:server
